name: Gear Gauntlet
description: Gear Gauntlet is a fun but rage inducing 2D action arcade game from Drop Dead Interactive. Test your patience through ever more punishing gauntlets while boosting, teleporting, reversing and rotating to survive. Use your reflexes to break through coloured barriers and earn your place on the leaderboard.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i3-2xxx Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 5800 Series DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 600 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i7-930 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 5800 Series DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 600 MB available space
